original: intro. case xbar; intros. assert (H1 := proj1_wd R f g e H). simpl in H1. exists (g x). exists x. split. reflexivity. auto. assert (H1 := proj2_wd R f g e H). simpl in H1. generalize (H1 x x0 H0); clear H1; intros. destruct H1. rewrite H1. exists x0. exists x. split. reflexivity. auto.
